title: Adding tags
content: Since the latest Thunderbird update I have been having trouble adding tags to messages. I can add the tags but the cursor drops down one or two pages instead of staying in the same position. Is there a setting I need to change or is this a new bug?
creator: myralandis

title: Login in Chinese???
content: Thunderbird has a Google sign in today AND the text is all in Chinese. For weeks now the TBird start up has been a mess where is was once seamless. What's going on Thunderbird?
creator: sjpalubinski

title: unable to receive or send emails
content: Unable to receive or send emails for the past 3 weeks. Have tried compacting, deleting, etc. Nothing works. I get no error messages - instead there is a black dot that swims from side to side next to the "inbox" tab at the top of the icons. When I click read emails, or click on "inbox" on the side (underneath my email address) it just buffers. HELP
creator: info5817
